game.title: A Perilous Journey
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen artifact from the dragon's lair.
game.description: A local village has been terrorized by a dragon that has stolen a powerful artifact. The villagers have enlisted the player to retrieve it.
game.reward: A large sum of gold and the gratitude of the villagers.

task.description: The dragon's lair is located in the mountains to the north.
The dragon is a powerful creature, so be prepared for a difficult fight.
Once the dragon is defeated, search its lair for the stolen artifact.

task.objective: Return the artifact to the villagers.
task.description: Once you have retrieved the artifact, return it to the villagers.
